[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ custom_padding=”0px||0px|||” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.4.7″ width=”70%” max_width=”95%” module_alignment=”center” custom_padding=”60px||134px||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.4.7″ border_width_right=”1px” border_color_right=”#ffffff” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.4.7″ text_font=”Lato|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#004B4F” text_font_size=”19px” text_letter_spacing=”0.5px” text_line_height=”1.8em” custom_margin=”||2px|||” custom_padding=”||26px|||” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”20px||||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” scroll_horizontal_motion=”0|67|67|100|4|0|-4″ text_text_color_tablet=”” text_text_color_phone=”” text_text_color_last_edited=”on|phone” text_font_size_tablet=”19px” text_font_size_phone=”17px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_orientation_tablet=”center” text_orientation_phone=”center” text_orientation_last_edited=”on|tablet” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Our Biggest asset is our people. At GMCI, we believe that it will be our people’s first choice, provide a platform to unlock their potential, celebrate our people and cultivate people to be winners. One of the group’s biggest strengths is that all workers carry out day-to-day tasks with a sense of purpose and commitment to the organization.

‘People’ are a main source of corporate competitiveness and ensuring highly motivated and competent employees is the basis of business operations. In addition, our economic environment has become much more complex and complicated due to the recent growth of our industry sectors and advancements in technological innovation. In these situations, it has become extremely important to secure employees with wide expertise and varied talents, and to concentrate on training so that employees can enhance their skills.

At the same time, employees themselves are also assertive in thinking about their careers, further motivating employees to develop and grow.
